akn:content.akn:p: §§ 600g to 600g–4. Omitted Editorial Notes Codification Section 600g, Pub. L. 93–493, title X, § 1001, Oct. 27, 1974, 88 Stat. 1496, related to authorization for construction, operation, and maintenance of Nueces River project. Section 600g–1, Pub. L. 93–493, title X, § 1002, Oct. 27, 1974, 88 Stat. 1496, related to repayment costs of Nueces River project. Section 600g–2, Pub. L. 93–493, title X, § 1003, Oct. 27, 1974, 88 Stat. 1496, related to water delivery and reimbursable construction cost repayment contracts. Section 600g–3, Pub.
